title: League continuously opens then crashes
body:
League continuously opens then crashes, repeating this harsh cycle till i hard shut it down with task manager where i have to spam end task before it disappears cause of its constant closing and re-opening. I really would like to figure out what the hell is happening cause this is not fun to deal with. 

I have tried to "run as admin", restarted my computer, and completely uninstalled and re-installed the client and yet it hasnt fixed it one bit.

replies.body: Go into discord, go to user settings and click the overlay tab. from there you can turn your overlay off. It fixed my issue
Just wanted to confirm that closing Discord Overlay should resolve these sudden influx of crashes!

Might be the new Discord overlay.  There's a thread on Reddit about it.
Do you have Discord open?

I found a work-around for this. Right click the client's shortcut, go to it's files. And open the lol.launcher.admin, it'll open the legacy client's startup screen and you'll be able to access League from there.
